title: Is there any chance we might see some funny tidbits concerning Pentakill?
body:
The lore we're getting is so rich, so deep, so goddamn epic, fleshes out the characters and is generally really mature/dark in some cases.

How about some light-hearted stuff to gnaw on while we wait for big lore releases?
Pentakill touring would be a great way to get some insight into the lives of champions in the locations they're having their concerts.
Like, I bet Sion and Darius are big Pentakill fans and would love to attend one of their concerts.

Or Karthus getting drunk and cursing at his fellow band members (gosh i loved that part of the old lore^_^)

Or their third big hit being "Mace of Spades" (Hue) featuring Mordekaiser's one and only performance as vocalist.

Or the chemistry between the band members

Or, you know, anything really^^

https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/apollo-dev/content/pentakill/article_lrg-3.jpg

replies.body: Probably Karthus has eaten a living bat during a live concert xD
Wasn't it a live poro?
Remeber that there is Sona too. She wouldn't allow that :p
Not to mention Braum banning them from ever touring in the Freljord XD
Pentakill Karthus has a Quote about the Freljord, cant remember what it is though
"We totally topped the charts in the Freljord!"
that one! Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R6uMxt6h,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-26T18:16:23.261+0000)
>
> Probably Karthus has eaten a living bat during a live concert xD

or maybe a live bat tried to eat him, that'd be funny

That third hit Mace of spades joke though^^

Imagine Morde on stage, shredding his guitar and going all Lemmy Kilmister
"The only skill I need is the Mace of Spades, the Mace of Spades!"
Or their rivalry with an upcoming Popstar?^^
We need to add Illaoi to the list... just as Tentakill{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Automatically downvoted when saw thread creator.

Glad to see I've got such a nefarious reputation.

It's a good day for being evil.
It's because I'm sick of seeing mordekaiser posts like please, stop.
And i'm sick of seeing weebs like you. Doesn't mean I go and downvote your posts just because of your username.
ahahha idiot, one piece is the only anime i like and your point is invalid, my reason to downvote is cause of hist posts not his name
Leave the boards then. No1 is going to miss a one piece fan
wouldn't pentakill be retconned? In the new lore I just can think how they would justify mordekaiser or karthus joining a band
Alternate universes and all that mate.
I feel like Sion and Darius would make a _killer_ mosh pit
I wonder if Olaf shares his Graggy Ice or if their sponsored by Graggy Ice. Or does Olaf sell his own drink called Rocky Ice? These are the things I wonder.

Olaf split from Pentakill and formed his own band, The Marauders:
- Olaf (bass/backing vocals - on some songs), Alistar (drums), Warwick (synth/backing vocals - on some songs), and Ashe (vocals/guitar)
Upvoted for the chance of seeing some  {{champion:83}}
RIP HUEKEISER {{champion:82}}
I loved how {{champion:2}} was one of the more reasonable of the lot.
